creator: Le Tran Social Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
The best app for corporate social responsibilities with highly effective worker surveys, and insight data visualization reports. Enable employees to freely participate in the labor, environment and sustainability dialogue with a masked profile after authentication.

GOPY FEATURES:
* Connect with people from your workplace: Keep up with what other people are talking about and join the conversations with your co-workers.

* Share photos, videos and music: Share your moment, the music that you love and videos that interest you and discover trends.

* Know your rights: As an employee, you’re protected under labor laws and your rights must be respected. Knowing your rights would help you recognize violations regarding labor practices.

* Participate in labor practice survey: Is your workplace safe and healthy? Do get your break time and get paid correctly? Do you feel satisfied with your job? Take the survey and let us know.

* Redeem awards: Gopy tokens can be redeemed with a mobile card, shopping voucher, movie ticket, etc.
descriptionShort: Empower with a complete CSR ecosystem
title: Gopy

creator: Le Tran Social Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Join a network of thousand workers, build a better workplace through surveys, and advance your career with e-learning.

💓 3 REASONS TO LOVE GOPY:
- Your opinions are taken into accounts by company
- Access to the largest workers community
- Gain new skills and knowledge anytime, anywhere

Gopy is a workplace development platform that empowers workers with workplace surveys, feedbacks, discussion, grievance and much more.

No more hesitation in participating in workplace dialogues because now you can rate your company and give feedback anonymously. You can also talk to your co-workers and representatives freely about a work issues with end-to-end encrypted messagings. And, you can discover people, groups, news and communities that share the same interests as you.

📊 TAKE SURVEY & GIVE FEEDBACK:
- Rate your workplace practices
- Give feedback anonymously
- Earn points & redeem rewards

👥 SOCIAL NETWORKING:
- Make friends and join groups with mutual interests
- Share and view posts, photos, videos on social newsfeed
- Message friends securely with encryption

👩‍🎓 LEARN & EARN BADGES
- Join many free & paid online courses
- Develop a new technical or soft skill
- Earn certificates for work & promotion

- Post notification.

title:
Gopy -  Survey, chat, learn
2.5.8

creator: Le Tran Social Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Actively participating in and advocating for fairness in social and labor discussions form the cornerstone of sustainable development for any business!

Be part of Gopy's initiative to redefine the landscape of digital transformation for enterprises and supply chains by:

Effectively assist businesses in implementing modules such as CSR, ESG, Corporate Sustainable Due Diligence, Green Economy, etc., through inclusive features and functions (Engagement, Survey, Assessment, GMS, eLearning, Service Desk, etc.) with streamlined workflows. This ensures the practical and effective implementation of Responsible Business Conduct (RBC), compliance with Labor Rights, Social Responsibility (CSR), as well as ESG principles within your business operations.
Providing a useful tool for each employee to share information, and knowledge, and enhance the voice and role of employees in promoting the harmonious and sustainable development of the business, the supply chain, and compatibility with the Supply Chain Due Diligence process (CSDD).
Utilizing a data platform with a high level of compliance with both local and international GDPR standards.

Whether you represent a business or are an individual aiming to gain a more profound insight into the social, labor, and environmental dynamics within businesses, industries, or localities, Gopy offers comprehensive overviews and valuable insights tailored to your needs.

Join the Gopy community today and witness a transformative workplace experience like never before. Elevate your professional development and contribute to the creation of a better, more inclusive work environment.
title:
Gopy
2.8.16
